title: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi (A Bridge to the Starry Skies)
synopsis: Kazuma Hoshino is preparing himself for a new stage of his life as a teenager. Because of his brother Ayumu’s weaker than average health, their parents thought it best for the family to move out from the city to a more rural environment. Now the two brothers are off to the Yorozuyo Inn where they’ll be staying until their parents can settle affairs back in the city and set up their new home.
related_anime: ['Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi: Kakaru ka? Gakuensai ni Koi no Hashi', 'Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi']
